abstract: Senior security officials in Yemen say that Maj Ali al-Haji, head of counterterrorism in the southern port city of Aden, was killed when a car bomb exploded beneath his vehicle.
snippet: Maj. Ali al-Haji was killed in Aden, in southern Yemen, which has not seen as much of the urban warfare that is common in the capital, Sana.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Maj. Ali al-Haji was killed in Aden, in southern Yemen, which has not seen as much of the urban warfare that is common in the capital, Sana.

headline.main: Car Bomb in Aden Kills Yemeni Counterterrorism Chief
headline.print_headline: Car Bomb in Aden Kills Yemeni Counterterrorism Chief
headline.seo: Car Bomb Kills Maj. Ali al-Haji, Yemen Counterterrorism Head
